Reviews.Title: Better than others selling for more
Reviews.Author: J_Furst
Reviews.Content: I wanted an affordable Android phone that would sync with Google Calendar and Contacts online. This was a precaution so that if the phone was lost, stolen, or went faulty, such information would still be safe. All I had to do was get a replacement phone and 'download' the information. So I started out with an entry-level LG Optimus GT540 Android phone that had a fairly good review. I paid US$120 for it in July 2011. I am surprised to see it is still being sold now for even more (up to US$165).Well in trying to upgrade the LG phone, it became unusable so I started the hunt for another low cost phone. Well, I eventually chose this Samsung Galaxy Discover a month ago. I am glad I did. This phone is much better that the LG Optimus GT540 and at a lower price. Looking at different aspects:.. Screen: This phone has a capacitive touch screen versus a resistive screen. I find it much lighter to touch, more consistent and more responsive. Also there is a little more finger room and screen space with the slightly larger screen of 3.5" compared to 3.0"... Memory: I ran out of memory trying to download apps on the former phone. But I have loaded this new Samsung with similar apps and still have much more room. In fact, I note that this Samsung has over 12 times more internal memory than the LG... Operating System (OS): This Samsung with the later OS 4.04 has an improved onscreen keyboard and I no longer need to download a dialer and contacts app to overcome the limitation of the LG with its OS 2.1... Camera: This is about the same as before, but with 3 MP it is better than some similar phones with only 2MP. One disappointment is that it does not carry an LED flash, although gsmarena.com says it does. But considering the price and also that my former phone did not have this feature, I am still satisfied... Battery Life: Battery life has not improved much, with a lower capacity battery of 1300mAh (vs 1500 mAh). However, in actual usage, it appears that the Samsung has a slight advantage. Just checking now, the phone has done some 23.5 hours on battery and it indicates that the battery is now 52% of its capacity. This is with moderate use.Considering all the factors reviewed, overall I give this Samsung Galaxy Discover phone a 5 rating, especially for such a reasonable price of US$118. (I paid US$110.) And I would certainly recommend this phone way ahead of the LG GT540 even if the latter was fetching a lower price, which is now surprisingly higher.

Reviews.Title: maury
Reviews.Author: Rafael Mauricio Roitman B
Reviews.Content: I received this cell about one week ago , and it has been working without any fault. For those who want a cell with the basics features like internet, 3G and one of the last  android  software , as the really inexpensive price this is the one I recommend.

Reviews.Title: Excellent celphone
Reviews.Author: Rebeca Roitman
Reviews.Content: Its a very good celphone and easy to use! It has a lot of apps and functions and I didnt even had to spend a lot of money getting it, like a would've with a model like the samsung galaxy Siii mini.

Reviews.Title: Nice entry level phone.
Reviews.Author: Fabricio Monchez
Reviews.Content: This is an entry level phone, I bought it for someone else as a gift and besides the low specs it performs decently - not like my Nexus 4 - but It has enough power to do the regular things you do like surfing the web, social media, checking/writing emails, playing games, watching videos on youtube, etc.It doesn't have 4G, it only has 3G HSPA and only two bands: 850 and 1900, so before buying check if your network is compatible because if it isn't you would be stuck with 2G.

Reviews.Title: Great so far
Reviews.Author: Just Cooking
Reviews.Content: I've had the phone a couple of weeks, and I think its great so far...no problems.Seems like a neat little phone. The screen is a decent enough size.

Reviews.Title: very happy with phone
Reviews.Author: cj
Reviews.Content: very happy with the phone battery life was short until I discharge the battery all the way 2 x then recharge the phone when the phone is off. The customer service is great.

Reviews.Title: Good basic Android phone
Reviews.Author: Robert A. Porter "Bob"
Reviews.Content: Does everything I need and I got it unlocked, in factory packaging for about $100.I use my Nexus 7 tablet as my primary internet device, so this is mostly used as a phone with internet apps as a backup.  Frankly anything less than a 7 inch screen is too small for my fingers.It is noteably slower than the quad core Nexus 7, but otherwise fine.The option of adding a micro SD card is great, and negates the limitations of the internal memory.Some have commented in poor battery life.  Used mostly as a phone in standby, my Discover phone is currently showing 56% charge after 4 days and 9 hours.  Can't co plaun about that kind of perform:-) ance at all.  Turn OFF apps you don't need, like WiFi folks.

Reviews.Title: Not recognized by Samsung USA
Reviews.Author: Douglas A. Brazeal "Vegiman"
Reviews.Content: I received the phone and it powers up well.  I called Samsung USA to find some ID information that appeared to be missing.  They asked a few questions then concluded it was not supported by Samsung USA.

Reviews.Title: Battery doesn't hold charge for long
Reviews.Author: Salma Mohamed
Reviews.Content: Nice phone BUT it doesn't hold charge for more than an hour. Seems to have a faulty battery. Would NOT recommend this item for this reason. This was my first BAD purchase on Amazon. I may have to purchase another phone at an outlet store or risk purchasing another battery. Using my old phone again for now.

Reviews.Title: not original Samsung
Reviews.Author: gabriel
Reviews.Content: How do i begin..... phone is not an original Samsung. I was told by three different techs that this was a chinese knock off. Not a Samsung! Battery life is non existent. 4-5 hours standby?

Reviews.Title: pretty neat and cheap.  (go samsung)
Reviews.Author: tony cong
Reviews.Content: got two to replace ailing phones, and so far so good, also got silicone cases too.  i got these because they were the only ones with icecream and sub $100.

Reviews.Title: Great phone! Great customer service!
Reviews.Author: Amy Kirkman
Reviews.Content: This is a great little android phone. We bought two and initially had trouble getting them to work with our carrier (consumer cellular), but now they are working great! Before they recognized our SIM cards, I called canmobility customer service and they were very professional. In fact just after calling them the phone suddenly recognized the SIM card before we got to troubleshooting.  Not sure what the initial hang up was, they are doing perfectly fine now.Definitely worth the price for a smart phone without a contract!

Reviews.Title: life battery very short
Reviews.Author: maria
Reviews.Content: every thing is great about this phone, the only problem is the battery life. it doesnt last more than 4 hours. i really don t khow how to deal with this problem. I even downlaod battery life extended, but nothing. anyway, be aware of this problem before you decide to buy this phone.

Reviews.Title: Brutal Battery Life
Reviews.Author: Jon J
Reviews.Content: While I had read prior reviews which indicated poor battery life, I leaned toward giving Samsung the benefit of the doubt given their reputation.  No longer - the battery does not even last a day with very low usage.  Do not buy this phone unless you are going to plug it in every few hours.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: John A. Tsutsui
Reviews.Content: Seems to be a quality phone that works very well. This is our first smart phone so it is taking some getting use to it. Has a lot of  of nice features and functions and there are still more that I still have to learn.

Reviews.Title: Excellent, excelente (Venezuela)
Reviews.Author: Nestor Morales
Reviews.Content: Muy bueno para el precio...Caracteristicas excelentes...Levanta 3g en venezuela con todas las operadoraslo unico que viene en ingles, y no trae español pero si se le pueden instalar  software en español a excepcion del sistema operativoVery good for the price ...Features excellent ...Raise 3g in Venezuela with all operatorsthe only thing that comes in English, Spanish and bring not but if you can install software in Spanish with the exception of the operating system

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: SmittyGirl
Reviews.Content: So far I've only had it for a few weeks, but I really like it. It arrived sooner than expected, although it didn't have a manual with it. It came with it's battery and and a usb/wall outlet charger. The speed of the phone is great. The only thing I don't like about it so far is that the screen doesn't light up when you receive a text message. So if the phone is on silent you don't know you received a message unless you check. I use it with a T-Mobile sim card and it works perfect. My battery lasts about one day so I charge it every night, but I don't use very many apps. Mostly facebook and email. I love it so far!

Reviews.Title: A good phone
Reviews.Author: Paul Lynch
Reviews.Content: My main concern about this phone was the battery life, which other reviews had mentioned was short, but so far I have not experienced that problem.  I use the phone for listening to music, reading books, and taking pictures (and phone calls too, of course), and it is good for all of those.  The camera takes good pictures except when trying to take a picture of something at close range (1-2 feet away) in which case the picture is a bit blurry.  I have not tried the bluetooth feature, but the wifi works fine, except that sometimes I need to turn the wifi off and on again (once) to get a connection.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Aimee1134
Reviews.Content: Seems reliable so far. Battery life is okay, but not really phenomenal. My 16 yo daughter is happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone for young teen.
Reviews.Author: M. Buek
Reviews.Content: This phone is perfect for a young teen if you don't want to pay for a data plan.  They like the  touch screen and the fact that you can access Wi-Fi. I put in a basic plan sim card and it works fine for only $10 a month more on my family plan.

Reviews.Title: user interface
Reviews.Author: Kwame Amponsah
Reviews.Content: Excellent..this phone with its simple and easy user interface is recommended for those looking for a simple yet useful cell phone

Reviews.Title: A great phone that can't be beat for the price!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Gracer
Reviews.Content: Alright, so admittedly the first one I got had an issue, which, it seems, is somewhat common from other reviews. The battery on it would die at around 10 hrs even without use and in standby.That was unacceptable for me so I contacted Izone and sent the phone back. I did have to pay to ship the item to them, which always irks me a bit, but I understand a company needs to make profit on a phone they're selling for a very reasonable price.I knew the phone was great (because I bought two and the wife is loving hers) and when the replacement finally arrived I was treated to a phone for Under $100 that plays most android games I can throw at it with no problem. **Shout out to Frozen Synapse if your looking for a turn based, reasonable tactical game to play against friends** and is running a version of the Android OS that none of the other phones in that bracket are updated to.It's responsive, solid battery life (after the return I was able to run 24hrs with some fairly heavy use during the evening), looks great, and just feels solid. I'm not worried about breaking it like I am a lot of the plastic options that are in the sub $100 price range.Overall nothing I can really say negative about it once the battery was solved. Well if I had to harp on one thing it would be the camera which is nothing special... but that's why I have a camera and not why I bought this phone

Reviews.Title: Excellent Phone for the price.
Reviews.Author: VAN
Reviews.Content: While it's not a perfect homerun, this is a very good Stock non-touchwiz phone, with a reasonable speed CPU and memory.Using the info from here http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2201341 I was able to Root the phone and install the clockwordmod recovery.My only remaining complaint with the phone is that Samsung changed the standard Android Ice Cream Sandwich 4.0 lock screen and didn't give any options in the settings to change it back, so it still has the touchwiz slide to unlock screen, even if the rest of touchwiz isn't present in this phone's firmware.

Reviews.Title: Unusal power consumption behaviour when moving between countries
Reviews.Author: luigi
Reviews.Content: In my original review about 6 months ago I said "The phone is good for the price. But the battery it came with only lasts about 2 hours with the screen off and in airplane mode."It turned out that as soon as I left the US the battery behaved normally. Now 6 months later I'm back in the US for a week and the phone dies within 45 minutes for no apparent reason.

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: Paul Ngassa
Reviews.Content: Was looking for a smartphone with a bit more powerful os and found it with this one. it works just great and i haven't had most of the battery life issues most have talked about though that may be because i usually charge it

Reviews.Title: Simple phone
Reviews.Author: Leonid
Reviews.Content: It's a good phone for starters in the Android OS. It's really basic if you're not skilled with an smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Has newer android OS and is good for inexpensive do anything phone.
Reviews.Author: Sandra
Reviews.Content: Good phone with good functionality. This was exactly as advertised. It didn't come in brand new packaging and said it had signs of wear. I see no signs of wear and the packaging was still quite professional looking and there was more than adequated padding to protect the product from shipping damage.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing since I had the Galaxy Proclaim
Reviews.Author: Collin Henderson
Reviews.Content: Before I go further there is one thing I want to recommend to all Android phone users: I recommend turning these off at least once a day(even if only for five seconds), because rebooting the system is usually good for the system.Now to the important stuff.  I have one of these on the Net 10 service, and I will soon have a new phone.  I had the Galaxy Proclaim before I had this and it's a lot better(I gave it 5 stars).  The Discover looks good and feels pretty good in my hand, but it is slower than the Galaxy Proclaim.  Because of the fact that it has the newer operating system(Android 4.0), it's not completely useless, though many reviewers before me would make you believe such.  I admit, texting can be challenging if you're use to swyping, but if you ever had a keyboard phone, you can adjust to using the Samsung keyboard for typing.  Sometimes when you swype, the words you're trying to swype won't appear on the screen, which can be irritating.  Also, it's senses are kind of bad because when you swype for some simple words(such as simple), something completely different will show up and you'll be wondering how the system figures that was what you wanted to type based upon your finger's motion.  If you want to swype better, there are several swype apps available in Play store.Something else to adjust to is the fact that this phone does have 2 gigs of memory, and if you download a file managing app or an app such as Olive Office, you will have the internal and external memory options.  Your micro SD card is the external option.  And inserting the micro SD card requires you to remove the back cover; another change from the Proclaim, but the cover is easy enough to remove and reapply.Finally; I didn't like that this didn't come with a music player automatically; and I need one of those.  If it did, I totally missed it.  I know there are apps for it, but a lot of the better apps for them have ads, which get annoying after a while.  Maybe some other phones do have music players on them.Overall, this is a good phone and a good starter for someone wanting to get into more advanced Android phones, but if you've had something like the Galaxy Proclaim, you should probably get one of the ZTE's from Net 10; they'll be faster and probably better than the Discover.  Samsung underachieved with this one, but it's not completely useless.

Reviews.Title: Do Not use this for Straight Talk
Reviews.Author: 1940sfilmsfan
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone in January to use on a Straight Talk plan.  By April the battery wouldn't hold a charge.  The phone had a year warranty so I mailed it back for a replacement.  After a week without a phone, the new one won't open mms messages.  I called Straight Talk and took the phone into the store and they basically said I was SOL and that this is a common problem with the phone but there's nothing they can do.  Just wanted to warn other Straight Talk users not to buy this phone and lose the money like I did.

Reviews.Title: Decepcionado /disappointed
Reviews.Author: Anderson Trujillo
Reviews.Content: The phone is not released, do not grab any 3G operator in Venezuela, just the language, you can not install another ROOM. Aside came very poorly packaged, I did not come in box, I came in an envelope with no protection, not brought headset, also can not send a release that does not bring 3G bands working in Venezuela, not recommend the phone I got seems to be used. I recommend NOT to buy this phone for use in Venezuela. No good.El teléfono no viene liberado, no agarra 3G con ninguna operadora en Venezuela, sólo tiene el idioma inglés, no se le puede instalar otra ROM. Aparte vino muy mal embalado, no me vino en su caja, me llegó en un sobre sin protección, no trajo manos libres, Tampoco se puede mandar a liberar porque no trae las bandas 3G que trabajan en Venezuela, No lo recomiendo, el teléfono que me llegó parece ser usado. NO les recomiendo comprar este teléfono para usarlo en Venezuela. No sirve.

Reviews.Title: These guys are great and I love the phone
Reviews.Author: jgar
Reviews.Content: Bought 2 of these and 1 worked perfectly but the other wouldn't hold its charge. Some of the people said this in the reviews but I contacted them and had a new phone in 2 days. Great service and the phones are working great.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE!!
Reviews.Author: Katie W.
Reviews.Content: This phone is awful. The worst phone I've ever had. And I've had a decent about of phones.I've never written one of these reviews, because its never been big enough of a deal.Doesn't hold a charge at all. I can unplug it in the morning and it'll be at 60% in 2 hours, I won't even really use it. It will go completely dead while the phone is OFF.Overheats often, freezes up. My biggest complaint is the battery. I haven't have the phone for 2 months. I got it for Christmas, yet the battery is messed up.

Reviews.Title: Hasn't impressed much
Reviews.Author: Dhanabalan Subramani
Reviews.Content: In my opinion this is not the phone to buy and it always has poor reception and the call gets dropped quite often and when I am on call waiting the other call gets dropped off no matter what. Better don't spend much on this.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Discover
Reviews.Author: Lizz D "Lady D"
Reviews.Content: My husband and I recently switched from a normal contract phone service to a pay as you go service. Since I wanted a smart phone, but didn't want to pay $550 for an iPhone or a Galaxy S4, I found this little guy. Since the reviews were decent, I decided to give it a shot. The interfaces are nice, the touch response time is good, The size is perfect.I've read that other phones have issues with battery, the first day I got this, the battery was at 50%. I let it die, then charged it normally. The battery on it started out great, would go for 24+ hours without needing charged. Now? One day I'll get 14+ hours out of it, the next I'll get less than 6. Also, when I turn the phone off, and it has full battery, then work for 6-10 hours and turn it back on? The battery is drained as if I've had it on all day. I've also tried throwing it into airplane mode to see if that will do anything. Nope. So the bad battery life is the biggest con to this phone.The Google Play app store has a ton of apps that work with this phone. The only problem I've run into is that you can't use a ringtone site to add ringtones to your phone. You need to add music to your phone, and from there you can set the ringtone.This phone does not have all the bells and whistles that an iPhone does, but if you're like me, and you don't need all those bells and whistles, and need a phone with internet, this is the phone for you.

Reviews.Title: not met my expectations
Reviews.Author: daniel
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure if this phone is a copy or not but I am not happy I had to take it to service as I could not set the language ...

Reviews.Title: Good Phone Price-wise
Reviews.Author: HS
Reviews.Content: This is a good phone looking at the price and what u can do with it. I will recommend it if you want an international phone, good phone and not on the pricy side. It fits snugly into the hands too.

Reviews.Title: >>Seller Unlocked<<< {Warrenty voided}
Reviews.Author: Cristian Vidaechea
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 of these, the phones are manually unlocked by the seller, one of them start giving problems one month after the purchased, now, i can't use the warranty because they has been an unauthorized unblocked.careful, if a phone has been handle at a software level by any other than the manufacture, its a huge risk

Reviews.Title: Good phones
Reviews.Author: WordsofIsa
Reviews.Content: Good phones, work as described.  The only issue we had was that they would not interface with our older router for wireless.  When we got a new router the problem went away.

Reviews.Title: battery life terrible!
Reviews.Author: ksquared
Reviews.Content: Charged this phone this am - fully charged - 4 hours later - with NO usage - 32% battery left.  I had already reduced the screen brightness and put a 30 second "sleep" on it. Would never buy this phone again - emailed customer service - never got a response.  Very disappointed with the product and customer service

Reviews.Title: Galaxy Discover
Reviews.Author: J. G. Samuels
Reviews.Content: Very Nice Phone, well built. My sister law bought this phone from me, am not too please with the display quality but the phone is unlocked and performs well.

Reviews.Title: Bad Chose for latin america
Reviews.Author: Felix José Tovar Manzano
Reviews.Content: Don't have spanish language and is not easy for handling. Any way is a good phone for a new person in technology

Reviews.Title: Nice package but it's very insensitive
Reviews.Author: Thomas Robertson
Reviews.Content: The first phone I received had the dreaded battery problem that other reviewers have reported, it drained the battery faster when switched off than when in standby.  I returned it to the seller and asked that he send me a fully tested phone.  To his credit, he exchanged the phone for one that he ran an overnight test on.  This solved the battery problem nicely, the exchanged unit will standby for at least four days and operate for a couple of days with use.I took the phone to Mexico and used it for a week. It worked fine as long as it had a strong signal.  It seems to be very insensitive to cell signals and wifi although both were usable.  The real problem for me is the GPS.  It's so insensitive that it's useless.  I was trying to use the Sygic GPS offline maps to navigate the streets of Mexico City.  I rarely received enough satellites to get a GPS lock on my location.  I used my Samsung Galaxy 7" tablet with the same software and it worked perfectly.  Even when the phone is in a place with a clear view of the sky it takes forever to find it's position and will frequently lose it  as soon as you start moving.I didn't have a chance to try the phone's 3G data network capabilities since I didn't have a data planVoice calls sounded great and I rarely experienced and dropouts.  Texting was easy to use.Overall I like the phone enough to keep it in spite of it's shortcomings.  The size is perfect for a pocket phone and the Android system works as it should.  I only experienced one system crash over a period of a week.  If you're looking for a basic Android phone that's easy to use, has good sound, and GPS isn't a priority then you might like this phone.  I wouldn't recommend the phone to a friend based on the possibility of receiving a phone with battery problems and it's lackluster WiFI and GPS sensitivity.

Reviews.Title: The Phone Died
Reviews.Author: Joy Rose
Reviews.Content: The cell phone, worked for just a short while, now it is not working at all. I had had my previous phone for years before it died.

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD PHONE
Reviews.Author: Jay N.
Reviews.Content: THE SCREEN IS A LITTLE TOUCHY AND TRYING TO ANSWER IT WHEN CARRYING IT IS A PROBLEM BUT IT WAS MADE IN CANADA AND I HAD TO GET ALOT OF BUGS OUT OF IT!  SAMSUNG FROM CANADA WAS VERY PROFESSIONIAL AND HELPFUL!  I WISH I HAD A BIGGER SCREEN AND SOME APS A LITTLER EASIER BUT SO FAR THIS PHONE IS WHAT I NEEDED.  IT HAS A GOOD SPEAKER AND MOST OF THE TIME WHEN I AM ON WI FI I DO NOT EVEN USE MY HEADPHONES.  THE HEADPHONES THAT COME WITH IT ARE VERY CHEAP AND I USE OTHERS OF A BETTER QUALITY AND THEY WORK GREAT!  I WISH THAT THE BATTERY LIFE WAS LONGER BUT I GUESS THAT IS TO BE EXPECTED FROM A SMART PHONE, IT IS MOSTLY A FUN PHONE AND I USE QUITE A BIT!

Reviews.Title: love this phone
Reviews.Author: Jayma Brooks
Reviews.Content: I bought it to get Straight Talk service.  I have it not and love it.  I was disappointed that they didn't put tracking on this type of item but I got it ok.

Reviews.Title: excellent.
Reviews.Author: Koku A Kamassa
Reviews.Content: I love that phone. Works correctly smooth and light. But I lost it a few days ago in a crowd.

ProductInfo.Features:
2G Network: GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900, 3G Network: HSPA 850 / 1900
Watch videos and browse the web wherever you are on the 3.5-inch touch screen display with WVGA resolution
The 3MP auto-focus camera captures any moment quickly and easily, MicroSD Slot for memory expansion
Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich OS keeps you running smooth with no software overlay to slow you down, English, French and Chinese languages (no Spanish).
BULK ITEM, NO RETAIL BOX, MAY BE CARRIER BRANDED BUT IS COMPLETELY UNLOCKED, INCLUDES: Phone, Travel Charger and Micro USB Cable, Rechargeable Battery
ProductInfo.Name: UNLOCKED Samsung Galaxy Discover SGH-S730M 3G Phone, 3.5" Touch Screen, 3MP Camera, Google Android, NEW, BULK PACKAGED, 2G GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHZ, 3G HSPA 850/1900MHZ
